definitions.title: n.f. a going, way, travelling-company,
definitions.body: sf. [[הֲלִיכָתָם]] Na 2:6 Qr ([[הלוכתם]] Kt); elsewh. only pl., cstr. [[הֲלִיכוֹת]] Ps 68:25, so Pr 31:27 Qr ([[הילכות]] Kt), [[הֲלִכוֹת]] Hb Hab 3:6, [[הֲלִיכׂת]] Job 6:19; sf. [[הֲלִיכוֹתֶיךָ]] Ps 68:25; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Na 2:6 they shall stumble in their going; elsewh. pl. goings:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Ps 68:25, Ps 68:25 of going, marching, progress of God into the sanctuary ([[בַּקּׂדֶשׁ]]; so Hup Pe Che; Ew Hi De in holiness ref. either to solemn processions of worshippers (e.g. De) or, perh. better, to the theophanic progress of God himself (e.g. Che); also

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of goings = doings [[חוֹפִיׇּה]] [[בֵּיתָהּ]] ´[[ה]] Pr 31:27 watching the doings of her household; of God Hb Hab 3:6 [[הֲלִכוֹת עוֹלָם לוֹ]] ways of eternity (al of old) are his.
